project.name: vertx-zero: Vertx Up Zero Framework
project.description: Vertx Zero Framework is a tool for Service Mesh Micro Service.

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/9.18.1/styles/idea.min.css">

                            <script type="text/javascript">
                                hljs.initHighlightingOnLoad();
                            </script>
                            <style type="text/css">
                            body{
                                font-family: "Verdana"
                            }
                            code{
                                font-size: 13px;
                                font-family: "PT Mono","Menlo","Monaco";
                            }
                            div.block {
                                font-family: "JetBrains Mono","Verdana", Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
                            }
                            div.block pre .java{

                            }
                            li.blockList > pre {
                                font-size: 14px;
                            }
                            .bar{
